item.title: Advent of Cyber 2021 - Day 1 & 2
item.description: Day 1 - Save The Gifts IDOR Vulnerability Question : After finding Santa’s account, what is their position in the company? Dengan mengubah parameter ID, kita dapat mengakses data milik orang lain. The Boss After finding McStocker’s account, what is their position in the company? Build manager After finding the account responsible for tampering, what is their position in the company? Mischief Manager What is the received flag when McSkidy fixes the Inventory Management System?
